name: PULUG SFD
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
To help add content to the website:

```
$ cd the_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.


### Rather Drive Stick?
push to branch named `gh-pages` to create a page manually. In addition to supporting regular HTML content, Pages support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator.

### Authors and Contributors
Built during SFD 2013 by Shubham Chaudhary (@shubhamchaudhary) and Shamsher Siddiqui.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
